titleStmt.title: There is now in the press, a geographic description of England, Scotland, and Ireland, with the isles thereto belonging which in a compendious method treateth of such things that are most necessary to be known, and as yet hath not been treated of by any author.
titleStmt.author: Blome, Richard, d. 1705.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
